item.title: Wrongly delivered?? recycling bin left in Trafalgar Avenue, 1st December
item.description:
A large blue recycling bin has been dumped on Trafalgar Avenue. It blocks their gates, and is in the way of the bus stop outside No 6, put people keep moving it between Nos 2 and 6 as it gets in their way. It has been there for a few days. Could you remove it please?
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Trafalgar Avenue, Old Kent Road, Greater London

item.title: There are various potholes outside of 76 Rushdene which shakes the house when vehicles go over these- these need to be repaired ASAP., 1st December
item.description:

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 76, Rushdene, West Heath, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Illegal advert on lamp posts, 1st December
item.description:
For last few months there have been these adverts on lamp posts all along Mcleod Rd SE2. They are every block or two from junction with Howarth Rd and down to end of Mcleod Rd to the roundabout at Knee hill. I see reports of them in SE3 in August but no mention of anything being done. They are an eyesore and should be removed.

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Crumpsall Street, Abbey Wood
Report on FixMyStreet
